info.title: Navigate to the first radio button in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnThirdRadioButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the third radio button

user: With focus on the 'Thin crust' radio button, navigate to the first radio button.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Thin crust' radio button, navigate to the first radio button.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: State of the radio button, 'checked', is conveyed
Position of the radio button, 1, is conveyed
Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
